name: PushSalesOrder
description:
Creates an order with all specified data, places it, and raises all follow-up events.

Whenever the order already exists with the same BackendSystemID/BackendID combination, nothing will be modified.

properties.name: BackendID
properties.description: A unique identifier for the order, within the context of given `BackendSystemID`

properties.name: BackendSystemID
properties.description: A code, free of choice for the calling 3rd party application creating the order

properties.name: OriginalCreationDate
properties.description: Original date when this order was created

properties.name: OriginalInvoiceDate
properties.description: Original date when this order was invoiced

properties.name: OriginalInvoiceNumber
properties.description: Original invoicenumber of this order

properties.name: HouseNumber
properties.description: House number, including possible extensions

properties.name: CurrencyID
properties.description: ISO code of the currency of the order

properties.name: AccountType
properties.description: Is this a Standard/Basic/Incognito account?

properties.name: Gender
properties.description: Possible values are: M, F, O

properties.name: DisableEventExports
properties.description: Enabling this will try to suppress as many eventexports as possible that might result from this call.

properties.name: Amount
properties.description: Amount of the discount, typically with a negative value

properties.name: BackendID
properties.description: Reference to the discount of the 3rd party

properties.name: FulfillmentMethod
properties.description: How this order is fulfilled, this can be overridden on line level. Default to Delivery or Pickup (when a PickupOrganizationUnit is defined)

properties.name: Amount
properties.description: Price of a single unit, before discounts, based on the SoldFromOrganizationUnit settings this should be in or ex tax. See service documentation.

properties.name: BackendID
properties.description: ID of the order line from the 3rd party

properties.name: ChildLines
properties.description: Child lines for this line

properties.name: Amount
properties.description: Price of a single unit, before discounts, based on the SoldFromOrganizationUnit settings this should be in or ex tax. See service documentation.

properties.name: BackendID
properties.description: ID of the order line from the 3rd party

properties.name: CustomFields
properties.description: Optional additional custom fields

properties.name: ArrayValues
properties.description: Used for multiple values

properties.name: ArrayValues
properties.description: Used for multiple values

properties.name: BlobValue
properties.description: Used for datatype Blob

properties.name: BoolValue
properties.description: Used for datatype Bool

properties.name: DateTimeValue
properties.description: Used for datatype DateTime and Date

properties.name: NumberValue
properties.description: Used for datatype Integer and Decimal

properties.name: StringValue
properties.description: Used for datatype String, Text and Enum

properties.name: BlobValue
properties.description: Used for datatype Blob

properties.name: BoolValue
properties.description: Used for datatype Bool

properties.name: CustomFieldID
properties.description: Identifier for the custom field

properties.name: DateTimeValue
properties.description: Used for datatype DateTime and Date

properties.name: NumberValue
properties.description: Used for datatype Integer and Decimal

properties.name: StringValue
properties.description: Used for datatype String, Text and Enum

properties.name: CustomID
properties.description: Article number of the product from the 3rd party

properties.name: Amount
properties.description: Amount of the discount, typically with a negative value

properties.name: BackendID
properties.description: Reference to the discount of the 3rd party

properties.name: GiftcardData
properties.description: Used for passing in the data for a digital giftcard.

properties.name: GiftcardMedia
properties.description: Used for passing in the media information for a digital giftcard.

properties.name: IsFinalSale
properties.description: Marks the line as a final sale line, making it non returnable.

properties.name: OriginalAmount
properties.description: Original price of a single unit, before discounts, based on the SoldFromOrganizationUnit settings this should be in or ex tax. See service documentation.

properties.name: PaymentLineIdentifier
properties.description: Used for passing the identifier used to identify this line at the payment provider. This is required for payments that need capture on line level like Klarna.

properties.name: PreferredFulfillmentOrganizationUnitBackendID
properties.description:
Allows you to specify a preferred organization for doing the physical fulfillment of the OrderLine.
Depending on your order orchestration configuration this can be a hard filter or merely a preference.

properties.name: ProductRequirements
properties.description: Product requirements

properties.name: SerialNumber
properties.description: Used for passing in the serial number of, for example, a gift card. This is used to support refunding and other operations on the gift card.

properties.name: BackendID
properties.description: Identifier of the shipment line

properties.name: ShipmentBackendID
properties.description: Identifier of the shipment, must exist in the Order.Shipments

properties.name: ShipmentDate
properties.description: Date when this shipment line was shipped, will fall-back to the Shipment.ShipmentDate

properties.name: TaxAmount
properties.description: When known the exact TaxAmount can be specified. Used when tax calculations are done by an external party like Avatax.

properties.name: TaxExemptionCode
properties.description: A code identifying the tax exemption.

properties.name: TaxExemptionReason
properties.description: A longer description with the justification for the tax exemption.

properties.name: TaxRate
properties.description: When no tax rate is provided, the taxrate will be based on what is known in Eva. When no rate can be determined, an error will be thrown.

properties.name: CustomFields
properties.description: Optional additional custom fields

properties.description: Used for multiple values

properties.name: ArrayValues
properties.description: Used for multiple values

properties.description: Used for datatype Bool

properties.description: Used for datatype Blob

properties.description: Identifier for the custom field

properties.description: Used for datatype DateTime and Date

properties.name: NumberValue
properties.description: Used for datatype Integer and Decimal

properties.name: StringValue
properties.description: Used for datatype String, Text and Enum

properties.name: CustomID
properties.description: Article number of the product from the 3rd party

properties.name: Amount
properties.description: Amount of the discount, typically with a negative value

properties.name: BackendID
properties.description: Reference to the discount of the 3rd party

properties.name: GiftcardData
properties.description: Used for passing in the data for a digital giftcard.

properties.name: GiftcardMedia
properties.description: Used for passing in the media information for a digital giftcard.

properties.name: GroupID
properties.description: Optional grouping identifier to keep lines 'together'.

properties.name: IsFinalSale
properties.description: Marks the line as a final sale line, making it non returnable.

properties.name: OriginalAmount
properties.description: Original price of a single unit, before discounts, based on the SoldFromOrganizationUnit settings this should be in or ex tax. See service documentation.

properties.name: PaymentLineIdentifier
properties.description: Used for passing the identifier used to identify this line at the payment provider. This is required for payments that need capture on line level like Klarna.

properties.name: PreferredFulfillmentOrganizationUnitBackendID
properties.description:
Allows you to specify a preferred organization for doing the physical fulfillment of the OrderLine.
Depending on your order orchestration configuration this can be a hard filter or merely a preference.

properties.name: ProductRequirements
properties.description: Product requirements

properties.name: SerialNumber
properties.description: Used for passing in the serial number of, for example, a gift card. This is used to support refunding and other operations on the gift card.

properties.name: BackendID
properties.description: Identifier of the shipment line

properties.name: ShipmentBackendID
properties.description: Identifier of the shipment, must exist in the Order.Shipments

properties.name: ShipmentDate
properties.description: Date when this shipment line was shipped, will fall-back to the Shipment.ShipmentDate

properties.name: TaxAmount
properties.description: When known the exact TaxAmount can be specified. Used when tax calculations are done by an external party like Avatax.

properties.name: TaxExemptionCode
properties.description: A code identifying the tax exemption.

properties.name: TaxExemptionReason
properties.description: A longer description with the justification for the tax exemption.

properties.name: TaxRate
properties.description: When no tax rate is provided, the taxrate will be based on what is known in Eva. When no rate can be determined, an error will be thrown.

properties.name: AllowPartialFulfillment
properties.description: Allow the order to be fulfilled in multiple shipments

properties.name: CheckOpenAmountIsZero
properties.description: When true, this service call return with an error when the order does not end up with an open amount of exactly 0

properties.name: DoNotInvoice
properties.description: Never generate an invoice for this order. The order will be completed when it's Paid+Shipped

properties.name: Amount
properties.description: Amount of the payment that was actually paid

properties.name: BackendID
properties.description: Identifier of the payment by the 3rd party (e.g. the one from the payment service provider (PSP))

properties.name: CapturedAmount
properties.description: Part (or all) of the amount that has already been captured for this payment

properties.name: Data
properties.description: Data that can be used to store anything that may be required later to verify the payment for example

properties.name: Method
properties.description: Code of the payment method (e.g. `ADYEN_IDEAL`)

properties.name: HouseNumber
properties.description: House number, including possible extensions

properties.name: PickupOrganizationUnitBackendID
properties.description: Identifier for the shop where the order will be picked up, if any (`OrganizationUnit.BackendID`

properties.name: ReturnToSupplierReason
properties.description: The reason for this ReturnToSupplier order, used in combination with Properties.ReturnToSupplier. Required for ReturnToSupplier orders

properties.name: ShipToOrganizationUnitBackendID
properties.description: Identifier for the shop where the order will be shipped to, if any (`OrganizationUnit.BackendID`

properties.name: BackendID
properties.description: Identifier of the shipment; should also be filled on Line.Shipments.ShipmentBackendID

properties.name: ShipmentDate
properties.description: Date when this shipment was shipped

properties.name: HouseNumber
properties.description: House number, including possible extensions

properties.name: Amount
properties.description: ShippingCosts, before discounts, based on the SoldFromOrganizationUnit settings this should be in or ex tax. See service documentation.

properties.name: Amount
properties.description: Amount of the discount, typically with a negative value

properties.name: BackendID
properties.description: Reference to the discount of the 3rd party

properties.name: Method
properties.description: Method that is used to ship the order (e.g. UPS, DHL, etc.)

properties.name: PaymentLineIdentifier
properties.description: Used for passing the identifier used to identify the shipping costs at the payment provider. This is required for payments that need capture on line level like Klarna.

properties.name: TaxAmount
properties.description: When known the exact TaxAmount can be specified. Used when tax calculations are done by an external party like Avatax.

properties.name: TaxRate
properties.description: Tax rate of the shipping method, when `Amount` / `UnitPriceInTax` is set and it's not provided, the taxrate will be based on what is known in Eva. When no rate can be determined, an error will be thrown.

properties.name: SoldFromOrganizationUnitBackendID
properties.description: Identifier for the (web)shop that made the sale (`OrganizationUnit.BackendID`)

properties.name: Code
properties.description: A unique ID identifying this error.

properties.name: Message
properties.description: A human-readable message describing the error.

properties.name: RequestID
properties.description: A unique ID identifying the request. Please provide this ID when contacting support.

properties.name: Type
properties.description: A short description of the error type.

properties.name: ExternalIDs
properties.description: When using the `ExternalIDs` mode, this will hold the resolved external IDs.

properties.name: IsAsyncResultAvailable
properties.description: This is a flag indicating whether the async request is done. If it is `null`, it is not an async service. If it is `false`, the response is not yet available. Do not process the properties in that case. It is is `true` the properties are filled with the result of the call.

properties.name: UnresolvedExternalIDs
properties.description: When using the `ExternalIDs` mode, this will hold the external IDs we couldn't resolve.
